0.text: Innate: Periodically, Rakan generates a 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 85% AP)  shield that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Rakan generates a 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 85% AP) shield that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits  reduce Fey Feathers'  cooldown by 1 second for each enemy  champion hit.
1.html: Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits  reduce Fey Feathers' cooldown by 1 second for each enemy champion hit.
markedPassages: reduce
champion

2.text: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or  Xayah is channeling  Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's  Recall completes.
2.html: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or Xayah is channeling Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's Recall completes.
markedPassages: Xayah
Recall
Recall

0.text: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: If the target was an enemy  champion or epic  monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan  heals himself and nearby allied champions for 30 − 115 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).
1.html: If the target was an enemy champion or epic monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan heals himself and nearby allied champions for 30 − 115 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).
markedPassages: champion
monster
heals

0.text: Active: Rakan  dashes to the target location.
0.html: Active: Rakan dashes to the target location.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second.
1.html: After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocks them up

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.
2.html: Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing
polymorphing
sleep

3.text: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
0.html: Active: Rakan shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
markedPassages: shields
dashes

1.text: Recast: Rakan mimics the first cast's effects.

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.
2.html: Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing
polymorphing
sleep

3.text: If  Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased  range.
3.html: If Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased  range.
markedPassages: Xayah
range

0.text: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming  ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and  charms and  slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
0.html: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and charms and slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
markedPassages: 75% bonus movement speed
ghosted
charms
slows

1.text: Colliding with an enemy  champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy  champion, he gains an additional  75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Colliding with an enemy champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy champion, he gains an additional  75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
champion
75% bonus movement speed

2.text: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.
2.html: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.

abilities.concerningText: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second.
Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming  ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and  charms and  slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
